applications.job_description: We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our Platform Team...
applications.requirements:
- 5+ years of software development experience
- Strong experience with distributed systems
- Proficiency in Python, Go, or Java
applications.preferred_qualifications:
- Experience with Kubernetes and cloud platforms
- Knowledge of microservices architecture
- Previous startup experience
applications.benefits:
- Comprehensive health insurance
- 401(k) matching
- Unlimited PTO
- Learning & development budget
applications.notes: Great cultural fit. Team uses similar tech stack to my experience.
applications.pros:
- Strong engineering culture
- Good work-life balance
- Interesting technical challenges
applications.cons:
- Commute distance
- Limited remote work options
applications.research_notes: Company recently raised Series B funding. Growing team from 50 to 100 engineers.
applications.networking_contacts: John Doe - Engineering Manager (connected on LinkedIn)
applications.interview_preparation: Review system design concepts, prepare STAR stories for behavioral questions

_instructions.description: This template allows you to upload multiple job applications at once. You can fill in as many or as few fields as needed - empty fields will be skipped.

field_notes.company_name: Required - The name of the company
field_notes.position: Required - Job title or position name
field_notes.salary_range_min: Optional - Minimum salary in numbers only
field_notes.salary_range_max: Optional - Maximum salary in numbers only
field_notes.currency: Optional - Currency code (USD, EUR, GBP, etc.)
field_notes.job_url: Optional - Direct link to job posting
field_notes.application_source: Optional - LinkedIn, Indeed, Company Website, etc.
field_notes.notes: Optional - General notes about the application
field_notes.pros: Optional - Positive aspects of the role
field_notes.networking_contacts: Optional - People you know at the company
